title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 18 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is rapidly constant from 2001/02 to 2015/16, slightly increasing from 2015/16 to 2016/17, and lastly gradually constant from 2016/17 to 2018/19.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2016/17 and 2017/18.
Max Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 307.0 was recorded at Year 2018/19
Min Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 105.0 was recorded at Year 2001/02
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 18 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2011/12 to 2018/19.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2006/07 to 2009/10.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2003/04 to 2006/07.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2009/10 to 2011/12.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately constant which exists from 2001/02 to 2003/04.
